title: Go live with Version 2 (production release)

requirements.text: Update the production version identifier to Version 2 by editing `frontend/public/app-version.txt` so the first line is exactly `Version 2`, and keep the existing `Routes:` line consistent with the app’s current routes.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/public/app-version.txt` retains a valid `Routes:` line matching the app’s core routes (/, /learn, /guided-forms, /contact).

requirements.text: Update deployment documentation to reflect that the current live release target is Version 2 by updating the `### Current Version:` section in `frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md`.
Run the existing post-deploy smoke check script against the production base URL after the Version 2 deployment and ensure all core routes return HTTP 2xx/3xx.

constraints: Do not modify any files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (read-only Shadcn components).
Do not edit immutable hook entrypoints: `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts`, `frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx`, `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`.
Keep backend as a single Motoko actor in `backend/main.mo`; do not introduce additional canisters/services.
nonGoals: Adding new product features or UI changes unrelated to the Version 2 production release.
Changing backend data models or performing state migrations unless explicitly required by the Version 2 release process.
